name: Alberto Rodriguez Larreta
introduction: Alberto Rodriguez Larreta (born 14 January 1934 and died 11 March 1977) was an Argentine racing driver. He raced in the 1960 Argentine Grand Prix driving a works Lotus 16, where he finished in 9th place after starting 15th on the grid. It is believed that he was subsequently offered a drive by Colin Chapman to race for Team Lotus, but that Larreta turned him down.
